mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANALYSIS ( ANALYSIS_ID, INPUT_TYPE, TEXT, IMAGE_URL, TONE, ANALYSIS_RESULT, SUGGESTIONS, USER_ID, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{analysisId}, #{inputType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{text, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{analysisResult, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{suggestions, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{userId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SYSTIMESTAMP, SYSTIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT ANALYSIS_ID AS analysisId, INPUT_TYPE AS inputType, TEXT AS text, IMAGE_URL AS imageUrl, TONE AS tone, ANALYSIS_RESULT AS analysisResult, SUGGESTIONS AS suggestions, USER_ID AS userId FROM ANALYSIS WHERE ANALYSIS_ID = #{value}

SELECT ANALYSIS_ID AS analysisId, INPUT_TYPE AS inputType, TEXT AS text, IMAGE_URL AS imageUrl, TONE AS tone, ANALYSIS_RESULT AS analysisResult, SUGGESTIONS AS suggestions, USER_ID AS userId, CREATED_AT AS createdAt FROM ANALYSIS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
